item.title: Recruitment
item.description: Make IT Simple’s owner Andy Jones started his career in Recruitment and hasn’t been able to shake it ever since. Over the past 15 years, most of our work has been in the recruitment space, whether that be front, middle or back office. We’ve built and customised a number of CRM’s/ATS’s as weel as middle office processes, timesheet and back office invoicing, reconciliation and ledger integration. We’ve also built from the ground up a number of systems for master and neutral vendor.
